front.title: Teredo: Tunneling IPv6 over UDP through NATs

abstract.t: We propose here a service that enables nodes located behind one orseveral IPv4 NATs to obtain IPv6 connectivity by tunneling packetsover UDP; we call this the Teredo service. Running the servicerequires the help of 'Teredo servers' and 'Teredo relays'; theTeredo servers are stateless, and only have to manage a smallfraction of the traffic between Teredo clients; the Teredo relaysact as IPv6 routers between the Teredo service and the 'native' IPv6Internet.
